BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: Oversight - The City’s Infrastructure to Handle & Process Organic Waste.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The City’s Infrastructure to Handle & Process Organic Waste.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Sanitation and the Department of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Dept of Sanitation and the Dept of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to accept commercial solid waste at city-owned or operated marine transfer stations and city-owned or operated rail transfer stations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of sanitation to accept commercial solid waste at city-owned or operated marine transfer stations and city-owned or operated rail transfer stations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the civil penalty for repeated littering violations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the civil penalty for repeated littering violations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to public organic waste receptacles.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: A Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.5322-B/S.4246-B, also known as the Packaging Reduction and Recycling Infrastructure Act, which would establish an extended producer responsibility system for packaging.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Packaging Reduction and Recycling Infrastructure Act (A.5322-B/S.4246-B).
